00001 // This is cul/bundler/bundler_tracks_impl.h
00002 #ifndef BUNDLER_TRACKS_IMPL
00003 #define BUNDLER_TRACKS_IMPL
00004 //:
00005 // \file
00006 // Provides a default implementation of the feature detect routines. These
00007 // can all be overridden by creating a new class that inherits from the
00008 // relevant stage. These defaults are the most general case.
00009 
00010 #include <vcl_vector.h>
00011 #include <vil/vil_image_resource.h>
00012 #include <bundler/bundler_tracks.h>
00013 #include <bundler/bundler_settings.h>
00014 
00015 //:
00016 // This is the default of the features detect stage.
00017 // It uses SIFT to find all of the features in the image set.
00018 class bundler_tracks_impl_detect_sift
00019   : public bundler_tracks_detect
00020 {
00021  protected:
00022   bundler_settings_sift settings;
00023 
00024  public:
00025   //: A default constructor that uses default settings
00026   bundler_tracks_impl_detect_sift()
00027     : settings(bundler_settings_sift()) {}
00028 
00029   //: A constructor that allows the user to override thresholds and such
00030   bundler_tracks_impl_detect_sift(
00031       bundler_settings_sift s) : settings(s) {}
00032 
00033   //: Performs the feature matching
00034   bundler_inters_image_sptr operator() (
00035       const vil_image_resource_sptr &image,
00036       const double exif_focal_len);
00037 };
00038 
00039 
00040 //: A functor that provides the default matching algorithm.
00041 // It outputs a  set of pairs of images that should be matched.
00042 // Constructors are the  same as above.
00043 class bundler_tracks_impl_propose_matches_all
00044   : public bundler_tracks_propose_matches
00045 {
00046  protected:
00047   bundler_settings_propose_matches_all settings;
00048 
00049  public:
00050   bundler_tracks_impl_propose_matches_all()
00051     : settings(bundler_settings_propose_matches_all()) {}
00052 
00053   bundler_tracks_impl_propose_matches_all(
00054       bundler_settings_propose_matches_all s) : settings(s) {}
00055 
00056     //: Performs the match list creation
00057   void operator() (
00058       const vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &features,
00059       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_pair> &proposed_matches);
00060 };
00061

00063 //:
00064 // A functor that takes in a pair of images to be matched,
00065 // finds all corresponding features between the two images.
00066 class bundler_tracks_impl_match_ann
00067   : public bundler_tracks_match
00068 {
00069  protected:
00070   bundler_settings_match_ann settings;
00071 
00072  public:
00073   bundler_tracks_impl_match_ann()
00074     : settings(bundler_settings_match_ann()) {}
00075 
00076   bundler_tracks_impl_match_ann(
00077       bundler_settings_match_ann s) : settings(s) {}
00078 
00079   //: Performs the feature matching
00080   void operator() (
00081     const bundler_inters_image_pair &to_match,
00082     bundler_inters_match_set &matches);
00083 };
00084

00086 //:
00087 // A functor that takes refines a set of matches features
00088 // according to some thresholds.
00089 class bundler_tracks_impl_refine_epipolar
00090   : public bundler_tracks_refine
00091 {
00092  protected:
00093   bundler_settings_refine_epipolar settings;
00094

00098 
00099   bundler_tracks_impl_refine_epipolar(
00100       bundler_settings_refine_epipolar s) : settings(s) {}
00101 
00102   // Performs the feature matching.
00103   void operator() (bundler_inters_match_set &matches);
00104 };

00107 //:
00108 // An functor that takes in all matched features between pairs
00109 // of images, and chains them together into tracks
00110 class bundler_tracks_impl_chain_matches
00111   : public bundler_tracks_chain_matches
00112 {
00113  protected:
00114   bundler_settings_chain_matches settings;
00115 
00116  public:
00117   bundler_tracks_impl_chain_matches()
00118     : settings(bundler_settings_chain_matches()) {}
00119 
00120   bundler_tracks_impl_chain_matches(
00121       bundler_settings_chain_matches s) : settings(s) {}
00122 
00123   //: Performs the track chaining
00124   void operator() (
00125       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_match_set> &match_set,
00126       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &images,
00127       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_track_sptr> &tracks);
